00016 void CConsoleBundle::Start(IBundleContext *context)
00017 {
00018         m_context = context;
00019         m_systemBundle = context->getBundle(0);
00020 
00021         ConsoleCommand* cmd = new CmdHelp;
00022         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00023 
00024         cmd = new CmdStart;
00025         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00026

00028         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00029

00031         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00032

00034         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00035 
00036         cmd = new CmdStatus;
00037         m_commands.insert(std::make_pair(cmd->getName(), cmd));
00038 
00039         m_consoleThread = boost::thread(boost::bind(&CConsoleBundle::ThreadRoutine, this));
00040 }

00043 
00044 void CConsoleBundle::Stop(IBundleContext *context)
00045 {
00046         m_consoleThread.interrupt();
00047 
00048         if(boost::this_thread::get_id() != m_consoleThread.get_id())
00049         {
00050                 if(context)
00051                         m_consoleThread.timed_join(boost::posix_time::millisec(1000));
00052 
00053                 for(TCommands::iterator it = m_commands.begin(), end = m_commands.end();
00054                         it != end; ++it)
00055                         delete it->second;
00056         }
00057 }

00082 void CConsoleBundle::ThreadRoutine()
00083 {
00084         std::string inputBuffer;
00085 
00086         while(!boost::this_thread::interruption_requested())
00087         {
00088                 std::cout<<">> ";
00089                 std::getline(std::cin, inputBuffer);
00090                 {
00091                         boost::lock_guard<boost::mutex> l(m_consoleLock);
00092                         OnCommand(inputBuffer);
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 }

00099 void CConsoleBundle::OnCommand(const std::string& cmd)
00100 {
00101         std::vector<std::string> elements;
00102         SplitCommand(cmd, elements);
00103 
00104         if(elements.empty())
00105                 return;
00106 
00107         const char* pargs[256];
00108 
00109         for(size_t i = 1; i < elements.size(); ++i)
00110                 pargs[i - 1] = elements[i].c_str();
00111 
00112         TCommands::const_iterator it = m_commands.find(elements[0].c_str());
00113 
00114         std::cout << std::endl;
00115 
00116         if(it != m_commands.end())
00117         {
00118                 it->second->Execute(*this, pargs, elements.size() - 1);
00119         }
00120         else
00121         {
00122                 std::cout<<"unknown command: "<<cmd<<std::endl;
00123         }
00124 
00125         std::cout << std::endl;
00126 }

00129 
00130 void CConsoleBundle::SplitCommand(const std::string& cmd, std::vector<std::string>& elements)
00131 {
00132         boost::regex exp("(\"[^\"]*\")|([^ \"]+)");
00133         boost::smatch match;
00134 
00135         std::string::const_iterator it = cmd.begin();
00136         while(boost::regex_search(it, cmd.end(), match, exp))
00137         {
00138                 std::string res(match[0].first, match[0].second);
00139 
00140                 if(res[0] == '\"' && res[res.length() - 1] == '\"')
00141                         res = res.substr(1, res.length() - 2);
00142 
00143                 elements.push_back(res);
00144 
00145                 it = match[0].second;
00146         }
00147 
00148 }
